title: Can't Queue Up
body:
I can't queue up for any game mode, it just gives me a message saying players not ready as showed in the image below. Any ideas on how to fix it or what may be causing this? I've tried logging onto another account but same issue. 
https://imgur.com/a/yTYnliW

replies.body: Same here happens in any game mode. This started in the new patch, hopefully we get this fixed I don't want to miss the event
